info.title: Loqr VerifyID API
info.description:
This API supports all the operations supported by Loqr's VerifyID product.
---

post.summary: Create a new digital onboarding process
post.description:
Create a new digital onboarding process

---
__Notes:__

  * The creation of a new digital onboarding process triggers the creation of an identity, that is automatically binded to the process

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Tenant ID

put.summary: Update the data associated to a verifyId process
put.description: Update the data associated to a verifyId process

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Tenant ID

parameters.name: processId
parameters.description: Process ID

get.summary: Obtain the data associated to a given digital process
get.description: Obtain the data associated to a given digital process

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Tenant ID

parameters.name: processId
parameters.description: Process ID of the related process

parameters.name: returnSources
parameters.description: Process if the `sources` response field should be filled in

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Tenant ID

parameters.name: processId
parameters.description: Process ID of the related process

get.summary: Returns the process' state history. Index 0 contains the current state while the last index contains the initial state.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Tenant ID

parameters.name: processId
parameters.description: Process ID of the related process

parameters.description: Identity ID of the related identity

parameters.description: Process ID of the related process

filename.description: The name of the document being uploaded.

toSign.description: Flag the document has required to be digitaly signed.

get.description: Obtain the process documents list that matches a given query

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: The tenant Id

parameters.name: processId
parameters.description: The processId Id

parameters.name: docType
parameters.description: Filter process documents by document Type

parameters.name: latest
parameters.description: Retrieve only the latest document of each document type

parameters.name: toSign
parameters.description: Retrieve only the process documents flagged to be signed

parameters.name: signed
parameters.description: Filter process documents that were digitaly signed

parameters.name: includeBlob
parameters.description: Include the document binary content endoded in Base64

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Filter documents that contains any of the given tags

get.summary: Obtain a process document data that matches a given query
get.description: Obtain a process document data that matches a given query

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Tenant ID

parameters.name: processId
parameters.description: ProcessId ID of the related process

parameters.description: Document ID of the related document

BadRequestMessage.description:
Bad Request
- Check Loqr Developer Portal for more detailed information

UnauthorizedMessage.description:
Unauthorized
 - Check Loqr Developer Portal for more detailed information

ForbiddenMessage.description:
Forbidden
 - Check Loqr Developer Portal for more detailed information

NotFoundMessage.description:
Not Found
- Check Loqr Developer Portal for more detailed information

InternalServerErrorMessage.description:
Internal Server Error
- Check Loqr Developer Portal for more detailed information

message.description: message related to the status code

key.description: The unique ID of a property.

value.description: The value of the unioque ID.

correlationId.description: The unique ID of a group of transactions

traceID.description: The unique ID of a transaction

extraProperties.description: Extra propoerties that are not hardly mapped on the object

ProcessData.description: Model that represents the information about a digital onboarding process to be created in the system

ProcessInvitePayload.description: Model that represents an empty object

ProcessInvite.description: Model that represents the information used to validate the invite

processId.description: The unique ID of the created process.

items.description: The unique ID of a created identity.

ProcessDataSources.description:
Holds the process specific data, split between the different sources
It may include several sources, but each each data field shall not be included in more than one field

IdentityDataPayload.description: Model that represents the information about a digital identity to be onboarded

ProcessDataPayload.description: Model that represents the information about a digital process to be onboarded

ProcessIdentityDataPayload.description: Model that represents the information about a digital process to be onboarded

IdentityDataSources.description:
Holds the identity data, split between the different sources
It may include several sources, but each each data field shall not be included in more than one field

Identity.description: Model that represents the information about an already existing digital identity

currentOperator.description: Id of the operator that is blocking the Identity

Process.description: Model that represents the information about an already existing digital process

flowExecID.description: Identifier of the execution of the flow in the execution order

execInstant.description: The instant when the flow was started

asyncExecutionId.description: If the update triggers some action, this Id is used to query about the status of that execution

isConfirmed.description: Indication of whether the phone number was already confirmed or not

asyncExecutionId.description: If the update triggers some action, this Id is used to query about the status of that execution

documentId.description: The unique ID of the attached document.

state.description: Current status of the given asynchronous execution process

retryInterval.description: Interval (in miliseconds) after which a new status check should be performed

DocumentDataDetail.description: Model that represents the information about an already existing digital identity

DocumentsListDetail.description: Model that represents the information about a list of documents
